item.title: MITM Risks in Signal? Cost of Numbers & Mitigation + Monologue
item.description: A quick disclaimer I use Signal regularly. It works well and sure beats SMS, Google Chat, Telegram, or messages on Facebook via the website - which I also use because I won’t disassociate with family or friends who only use any of the latter four to communicate. As much as I’d love to exclusively be on something like Session or Briar, I don’t use either because I don’t know anybody using them - I can hardly even convince people to use Signal.
